parameters.name: Keyword
parameters.description:
The keyword to be matched.

>  You can search for tasks by name or address. Fuzzy search is supported.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Default value: 10.

parameters.name: TaskId
parameters.description: The ID of the site monitoring task.

parameters.name: TaskState
parameters.description:
The task status. Valid values:

*   1: The task is enabled.
*   2: The task is disabled.

parameters.name: TaskType
parameters.description: The protocol that is used by the site monitoring task. Valid values: HTTP, PING, TCP, UDP, DNS, SMTP, POP3, and FTP.
